title: Athletes, Teams Speak Out: Sports in a Time of Protest (Podcast)
itunes:title: Athletes, Teams Speak Out: Sports in a Time of Protest (Podcast)
description:
Jason Kelly, Michael Barr and Mike Lynch talk about how athletes and teams have responded to violent protests across the country, and the historical role sports has played in times of civil unrest. The trio also discusses the ongoing -- and still contentious -- negotiations between Major League Baseball's players and team owners, and the increasingly real possibility of no season. They also celebrate the novel approach the Orlando Magic is taking to youth camps in the age of virus lockdown.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
